name: Sam's Trek to the Undaunted Powerful Intimidating Destination
name_original: Sam's Trek to the Undaunted Powerful Intimidating Destination
description:
This is a very S.T.U.P.I.D. game I made with Scratch. It only has one level.

Arrow keys to move. Avoid spikes. That's it.

(There is a secret, but it's really not worth finding)

Credit stuff:

  • Scratch is developed by the Lifelong Kindergarten Group at the MIT Media Lab. See http://scratch.mit.edu.
  • The Scratch to HTML converter I used was made by @Sheep_Maker. It can be found here.
